OCLibrary

group OCLibrary

Core types and definitions shared across the OCTypes system.

Defines

OC_INLINE

Typedefs

typedef unsigned long OCOptionFlags

Option flags used for string comparisons.

Base type for option flags, typically an unsigned long.

typedef OCComparisonResult (*OCComparatorFunction)(const void *val1, const void *val2, void *context)

Function pointer type for comparing two values.

Param val1:

Pointer to the first value.

Param val2:

Pointer to the second value.

Param context:

Optional user-defined context pointer.

Return:

Comparison result.

typedef OCOptionFlags OCStringCompareFlags

Type used to hold string comparison flags.

This is an alias for OCOptionFlags (unsigned long). Use constants from OCStringComparisonFlagsEnum with this type.

See also

OCStringComparisonFlagsEnum

Enums

enum OCComparisonResult

Result values returned by OCComparatorFunction.

Values:

enumerator kOCCompareLessThan

First value is less than the second.

enumerator kOCCompareEqualTo

Values are equal.

enumerator kOCCompareGreaterThan

First value is greater than the second.

enumerator kOCCompareUnequalDimensionalities

Different dimensionalities.

enumerator kOCCompareNoSingleValue

No singular comparison result available.

enumerator kOCCompareError

An error occurred during comparison.

enum OCStringComparisonFlagsEnum

Defines constant flags for string comparison operations.

These flags are used with the OCStringCompareFlags type (which is an OCOptionFlags) to modify comparison behavior.

See also

OCStringCompareFlags

Values:

enumerator kOCCompareCaseInsensitive

Case-insensitive comparison.

enumerator kOCCompareBackwards

Compare from the end of the string.

enumerator kOCCompareAnchored

Anchor comparison to the beginning.

enumerator kOCCompareNonliteral

Non-literal comparison (e.g.

normalization).

enumerator kOCCompareLocalized

Locale-aware comparison.

enumerator kOCCompareNumerically

Numeric-aware comparison.

enumerator kOCCompareDiacriticInsensitive

Ignore diacritics.

enumerator kOCCompareWidthInsensitive

Ignore character width differences.

enumerator kOCCompareForcedOrdering

Enforce ordering even if equal.

enum OCDiacriticCompatibilityFlagsEnum

Defines compatibility flags for diacritic-insensitive comparison.

Values:

enumerator kOCCompareDiacriticsInsensitive

Alias for diacritic insensitive.

enumerator kOCCompareDiacriticsInsensitiveCompatibilityMask

Compatibility mask.

Functions

static inline OCRange OCRangeMake(uint64_t loc, uint64_t len)

Convenience function to create an OCRange.

Parameters:

  • loc – Start index.

  • len – Number of elements.

Returns:

OCRange with the given location and length.

void OCLibraryTeardown(void)

Tears down the OCTypes library and releases any global resources.

struct OCRange
#include <OCLibrary.h>

A structure representing a contiguous byte or element range.
